about_the_game:
Guitar Fretter is an action puzzle game and playful practice tool all about making a game of memorizing the note positions on a 4 or 5 string bass or 6 or 7 string guitar. For both guitarists and guitar-curious folk.

Game play: first choose your guitar setup, custom tuning if you wish, and level of challenge. Then mysterious creatures show up ready to take your energy if you miss a match. Match the notes, score health and points. Find note patterns and hints. Along the way learn patterns of notes on the guitar fretboard. And get little bits of story and encouragement between levels.

Story: Pick and Crunchy are walking home from their band practice space when suddenly swirling portals open midair all around them. Mysterious creatures emerge, hungry to take energy from any musicians they can find. The only way to escape is to send them back by matching the notes they carry.

Features:

+ Action puzzle game: match the notes to get past each level

+ 4 types of guitars: 6 and 7 string electric, 4 and 6 string bass.

+ Lefty flip: rotate any guitar 180 degrees. NEW feature for Guitar Fretter 2.0!

+ Ninja mode: hide all the hints during a regular game to get more points and test your memory. Or choose to start a full ninja mode game to remove hints fully and go for the extra challenge.

+ Custom tuning: raise or lower each string's pitch to practice a new playing style.

+ Encouragement: Built in bits of story, encouragement, and hints on the transition screens.

+ Game save: Save your game in progress to continue later.

+ Practice mode: play any guitar as an interactive chart of notes without the pressure of the mysterious portal creatures.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Action puzzle practice game for memorizing the note positions on a 4 or 5 string bass or 6 or 7 string guitar. Match the notes of the creatures to the guitar, get big points for combos and streaks. Choose a difficulty and survive the note memorization arcade challenge of Guitar Fretter.
